trans-unit.source: Determines if the contract for the transfer of messages from a client to an application requires a session and whether the delivery of messages must preserve the order in which operations are called by the client.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否从客户端的应用程序的消息传输协定需要会话以及消息的传递必须保留客户端调用操作的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The TransferSession enumerations are typically used in association with a service contract.
trans-unit.target: TransferSession 枚举通常用于在关联中与服务协定。

trans-unit.source: When a client sends messages to a remote application or service to call operations, TransferSession is used to determine if a session is required to interact with the service and whether the messages used to invoke the operations at a service must arrive in the same order in which they were sent.
trans-unit.target: 当客户端将消息发送到的远程应用程序或服务调用操作时，TransferSession 用于确定是否需要与服务和是否必须用来调用服务操作的消息到达与发送这些相同的顺序进行交互会话。

trans-unit.source: Message delivery between client and service requires a session to preserve the order in which operations are called by the client.
trans-unit.target: 客户端和服务之间的消息传递需要会话，以保留客户端调用操作的顺序。

trans-unit.source: If there is no session between endpoints, then the delivery order does not reflect the order in which the messages are sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果终结点之间没有会话，则传递顺序不反映将消息发送的顺序。

trans-unit.source: - The value of TransferSession that an application uses specifies whether the application requires a specific order in the calling sequence.
trans-unit.target: -应用程序使用的 TransferSession 的值指定应用程序是否需要调用的序列中的特定订单。

trans-unit.source: If Ordered, then the contract requires that messages must arrive in the order in which they are sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果排序的协定要求消息必须发送这些顺序到达。

trans-unit.source: - If Unordered, then the messages used to invoke public operations can arrive in any order.
trans-unit.target: -如果未排序，然后用于调用公共操作的消息可以按任何顺序到达。

trans-unit.source: If None, there are no sessions.
Specifies that a session is not required to interact with the services on this contract.
trans-unit.target: 指定会话不需要与此协定上的服务进行交互。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a session with ordered message delivery guarantees is required to interact with the services on this contract.
trans-unit.target: 指定与有序的消息传递保证的会话，不需要与此协定上的服务进行交互。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a session with unordered message delivery guarantees is sufficient to interact with the services on this contract.
trans-unit.target: 指定与无序的消息传递保证的会话已足够与此协定上的服务进行交互。
